about_the_game:
Total of 10 newly designed Face CG. The set contains "Hideyoshi Toyotomi", "Rairen Shimotsuma", "Fujitaka Hosokawa", "Yoshikiyo Murakami", "Yoshikage Asakura" and from User Choice on Nobunaga's Ambition Day, March 30th, 2015, "Nobutada Oda", "Kai Narita", "Naotora Ii", "Tahe Mori" and "Nagayoshi Mori".
The Face CG can be set in the game from "Edit Historical Officers".
detailed_description:
Total of 10 newly designed Face CG. The set contains "Hideyoshi Toyotomi", "Rairen Shimotsuma", "Fujitaka Hosokawa", "Yoshikiyo Murakami", "Yoshikage Asakura" and from User Choice on Nobunaga's Ambition Day, March 30th, 2015, "Nobutada Oda", "Kai Narita", "Naotora Ii", "Tahe Mori" and "Nagayoshi Mori".
The Face CG can be set in the game from "Edit Historical Officers".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Traditional Chinese Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128MB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is only supported for Traditional Chinese versions of Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1.
